markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Raging Thrower](/Feats.aspx?ID=133) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 88 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the [Brutal Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=174) feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.
name: Raging Thrower
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 88 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon attacks. If you have the [Brutal Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=174) feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.
</summary>
summary: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your  thrown  weapon attacks. If you have the  Brutal Critical  feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.
summary_markdown: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon attacks. If you have the [Brutal Critical](/Feats.aspx?ID=174) feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.
